posts.title: Toilet Bowl Pet Drinking Fountain
posts.content: Encourage your pet’s bad habits by having them drink from the toilet bowl pet drinking fountain. Simply place any two liter bottle onto the back of the tank and gravity pulls it into the small toilet bowl at the base so Sparky can stay well hydrated while you have a laugh.

posts.title: Pineapple Shaped Tumbler
posts.content: Bring a tropical vibe to your home bar using this pineapple shaped tumbler. This quirky two piece brass tumbler comes apart at the center and can also be utilized as a drinking cup by placing the larger bottom half over the top half.

posts.title: Magnetic Decision Maker
posts.content: Quit struggling with life’s hard choices once and for all by leaving them all up to the magnetic decision maker. You simply move the ball, release it, and wait for it to land on “yes”, “no way”, try again”, “definitely”, “maybe”, or the always popular “ask a friend”.

posts.title: The Mighty Handle
posts.content: Only little weaklings make two trips when bringing the groceries into the house. So carry your entire load in one short trip by hooking your bags onto the Mighty Handle. It comes with an ergonomic handle and a pair of hooks that can hold up to 50 pounds in total.

posts.title: WTF Button
posts.content: Speak your mind without uttering a word with the WTF button. Every press of this over-sized big red button reveals a hilarious rendition of the famous WTF saying, so that no matter how fucked things may seem, you can bring levity to any situation.

posts.title: Microchip Pet Door
posts.content: Give your furry friend the freedom to come and go as he pleases with this microchip pet door. It’s compatible with all worldwide microchip formats, can be set to lock and unlock at specific times, and only works with your pet’s microchip – preventing strays from entering.

posts.title: Organic Bath Bombs
posts.content: Transform your bath into a spa-quality soak by dropping one of these organic bath bombs into your tub. Each pack includes 6 different aromatherapy bombs like “muscle relief” and “bedtime ritual”, so you can sooth yourself in a variety of ways.

posts.title: Chinese Flying Lanterns
posts.content: Light up the sky with these easy and fun to use Chinese Flying Lanterns. Simply light the bottom of the lantern, let it fill it up with hot air, release it, and watch it fly away! These Flying Lanterns are sure to create a lasting memory whenever they are lit.

posts.title: NERF Thunder Bow
posts.content: Take your NERF wars to new heights by arming you and your comrades with these lethal NERF thunder bows. It’s designed to handle like a real bow and can fire up to five darts all at once – no reloading required – that will scream through the air.

posts.title: Money Toilet Paper Roll
posts.content: Before the recession hit, the purest form of wealth was exhibited by how much money you could wipe your ass with. But now in these tough economic times, how is one supposed to keep up this expensive habit? The answer is these novelty money toilet paper rolls.

posts.title: AlphaPro Strength & Conditioning Tool
posts.content: Improve your mobility and overall strength by incorporating the AlphaPro strength and conditioning tool into your workout. With the bar and resistance bands you’ll be able to perform functional exercises that will improve flexibility, stability, and coordination.

posts.title: Thumb Wrestling Ring
posts.content: Now that thumb wrestling is an officially accepted sport at the Olympics, you can now train with unparalleled realism with these thumb wrestling rings. Just have you and your sparring partner slip your thumbs up in the wrestling ring, and have at it!
